greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Sum_{k=1..n-1} (k OR n-k).
reference: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
link: M. Le Brun, Email to N. J. A. Sloane, Jul 1991
program: (PARI) a(n)=sum(k=1,n-1, bitor(k,n-k)) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Aug 11 2017
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
